alfredsnippet.snippet:
def highlight(df):
    c1 = 'background-color: #83AF9B'
    c2 = 'background-color: #A7226E'
    df1 = pd.DataFrame(c2, index=df.index, columns=df.columns)
    
    # mask
    colA,colB = 'c0', 'c1'
    mask = df[colA] < df[colB] 
    df1.loc[mask] = c1

    return df1

df3.style.apply(highlight, axis=None)
